text: Orga may refer to: ==Real persons== * Irfan Orga (1908–1970), Turkish author ==Fictional persons== * Orga (Godzilla), a monster from the 1999 movie Godzilla 2000: Millennium. * Kamen Rider Orga, a character from the Kamen Rider 555 film * Orga Sabnak, a character from Gundam SEED ==Organisations== * Orga Systems GmbH, a software company * Organización Republicana Gallega Autónoma, the Autonomous Galician Republic Organisation, a Spanish political party
title: Orga
